name: Starfish
tagline: Forward model your stellar spectra for inference of effective temperature, surface gravity, and metallicity!
body:
# Starfish
## Forward model your stellar spectra for inference of effective temperature, surface gravity, and metallicity!

Starfish is an implementation of the forward modelling framework described in Czekala et al. 2014 (link). 

### Authors and Contributors
2014. Ian Czekala (@iancze), Sean Andrews (@seanandrews), David Hogg (@davidwhogg)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
